## R Experiments


Loading map data of the continental US
group helps to group all the long and lat values to a specific state/region
```{r cars}
states_map <- map_data("state")
states_map
```



```{r}
ggplot(states_map, aes(long, lat, group = group))+
  geom_polygon(aes(fill = region), color = "white")
```
